description: Localization of lipoproteins endogenously expressed under standard culture conditions was determined using multidimensional protein identification technology (MudPIT) mass spectrometry. B. burgdorferi B31A3 intact spirochetes were subjected to surface proteolysis with proteinase K.

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Alexander S. Dowdell, Maxwell D. Murphy, Christina Azodi, Selene K. Swanson , Laurence Florens, Shiyong Chenac & Wolfram R. Z�ckert. Comprehensive Spatial Analysis of the Borrelia burgdorferi Lipoproteome Reveals a Compartmentalization Bias Toward the Bacterial Surface. J Bacteriol. 2017 Jan 9.  doi:10.1128/JB.00658-16.

title: Comprehensive Spatial Analysis of the Borrelia burgdorferi Lipoproteome
